shader_get_name: With this function you can retrieve the name of a shader resource. You supply the unique ID value for the shader to get the name of and the function will return the name of the resource as a string.
The index of the shader to get the name of.

{ANY_CODE} var _shader = shader_current();
var _name = shader_get_name(_shader);
draw_text(32, 32, "Debug - Currently Rendering{nbsp_x1}= " + _name);
The above code will get the name of the given shader and draw it to the screen.
